What are the best hotels near Bank of America Plaza?

HotelDescriptionLink 1. Crowne Plaza Hotel Dallas Downtown An Ihg Hotel The Crowne Plaza Hotel Dallas Downtown An Ihg Hotel is a popular 3 star hotel located approx. 0.1 miles north of Bank of America Plaza and about a 1 min. walk. Recent guests gave this hotel an avg. guest review rating of 3.5 out of 5. Get the latest price 2. Homewood Suites by Hilton Dallas Downtown, TX The Homewood Suites by Hilton Dallas Downtown, TX is an attractive 3-Star hotel located about 0.1 miles northeast of Bank of America Plaza and approx. a 1 minute stroll by foot. With a verified guest score of 4.5/5, this makes it one of the most enticing hotel options near Bank of America Plaza. Get the latest price 3. Westin Dallas Downtown The Westin Dallas Downtown is a pleasing 4-Star hotel located ~0.1 mi. east of Bank of America Plaza and roughly a 1 minute walk. Recent hotel guests gave this hotel an avg. guest review rating of 4/5. Get the latest price 4. Aloft Dallas Downtown The Aloft Dallas Downtown is an attractive 3-Star hotel located about 0.2 miles southeast of Bank of America Plaza and approx. a 3 minute walk. With a verified guest score of 4/5, this makes it one of the perfect hotels near Bank of America Plaza. Get the latest price 5. Holiday Inn Express Dallas Downtown, an IHG Hotel The Holiday Inn Express Dallas Downtown, an IHG Hotel is a well-liked 3 star hotel located about 0.2 miles southwest of Bank of America Plaza and about a 3 min. walk by foot. Recent guests gave this hotel an average guest review rating of 3.5 out of 5. Get the latest price
